## Appendix tables

```{r Demographic characteristics, echo=FALSE}
T1_imm <- T1 %>%
  select(Age, Sex, Year, Immigration, WTS_M)

t1_imm_design <- survey::svydesign(id=~0, weights=~WTS_M, data=T1_imm)

t1_year <-gtsummary::tbl_svysummary(data =t1_imm_design, 
                                        by = 'Year',
                                        digits = everything() ~ 0,
                                        missing = "no") %>%
t1_year_final <- print(t1_year)

gtsummary::as_hux_table(t1_year) %>%
  huxtable::quick_xlsx(file = "Table0-Descriptive_by_Demo.xlsx")
```

```{r Response rates}
responses <- T1_imm %>%
  group_by(Year, Immigration) %>%
  summarise(NumResp=length(Immigration)) %>%
  spread(Year, NumResp)

write.csv(responses, "Table0-Respondent.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
